changeSet.author: rodrigolicks
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.sessao ( id int4 GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE) NOT NULL, duracao_votacao int4 NULL, fim_votacao timestamp(6) NOT NULL, inicio_votacao timestamp(6) NOT NULL, votos_nao int4 NULL, votos_sim int4 NULL, pauta_id int4 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT sessao_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
